alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 9:03AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A moderate to heavy lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Erie County Until 1030 AM EST.... At 859 AM EST, radar indicated a band of moderate to heavy lake effect snow across northeastern Erie County. Web cams and local observations show visibilities of a quarter to a half of a mile with snow accumulation on roadways. This band will gradually lift north over the next few hours. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations impacted include... Erie, North East, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville and Northwest Harborcr. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. This band is impacting portions of I- 90 and I-86 in northeastern Erie County. &&
